thread.title: Europe’s Markets Rule Comes With a Cost

author: wsjcom
title: Europe’s Markets Rule Comes With a Cost
text:
Jan. 3, 2018
Europe’s new Markets in Financial Instruments Directive, or Mifid II, is “designed to make finance fairer and safer. But that laudable aim comes at a heavy cost,” Neil Unmack writes for Reuters Breakingviews. In addition to the money spent preparing for their rollout and compliance costs in years to come, Mifid II could lead banks to conduct less financial analysis and spur consolidation, he says. “The rules may also create new loopholes in financial markets” and “may encourage more trading to shift outside the...
